title: What Exceptions Should Spack Packages Raise?
body:
Many Spack packages raise exceptions that check for conditions on the variants beyond what the standard concretizer is capable of.  In that case, what exception should the package raise?  I see a lot of variant below.

More generally, what are the guidelines for what exceptions should be raised under what conditions?
